verses.verse: דְּבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָיָ֗ה <WH1961> came אֶל־ <WH413> to צְפַנְיָה֙ <WH6846> which came unto Zephaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son כּוּשִׁ֣י <WH3569> Cushi בֶן־ <WH1121> the son גְּדַלְיָ֔ה <WH1436> of Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲמַרְיָ֖ה <WH568> of Amariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חִזְקִיָּ֑ה <WH2396> of Hizkiah בִּימֵ֛י <WH3117> in the days יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֖וֹן <WH526> of Amon מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

אָסֹ֨ף <WH622> I will utterly אָסֵ֜ף <WH622> assemble כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> all מֵעַ֛ל <WH5921> From פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> the face הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> of the earth נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

אָסֵ֨ף <WH622> assemble אָדָ֜ם <WH120> man וּבְהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> and beast אָסֵ֤ף <WH622> assemble עוֹף־ <WH5775> the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of the heaven וּדְגֵ֣י <WH1709> and the fishes הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea וְהַמַּכְשֵׁל֖וֹת <WH4384> and the stumblingblocks אֶת־ <WH854> along הָרְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> with the wicked וְהִכְרַתִּ֣י <WH3772> and I will cut off אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָדָ֗ם <WH120> man מֵעַ֛ל <WH5921> from פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from off הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> the land נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְנָטִ֤יתִי <WH5186> I will also stretch out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> mine hand עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> upon Judah וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and upon all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְהִכְרַתִּ֞י <WH3772> and I will cut off מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמָּק֤וֹם <WH4725> from this place הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> the remnant הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> of Baal אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> [and] the name הַכְּמָרִ֖ים <WH3649> of the Chemarims עִם־ <WH5973> along הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> with the priests

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁתַּחֲוִ֥ים <WH7812> And them that worship עַל־ <WH5921> on הַגַּגּ֖וֹת <WH1406> upon the housetops לִצְבָ֣א <WH6635> the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוִים֙ <WH7812> and them that worship הַנִּשְׁבָּעִ֣ים <WH7650> [and] that swear לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> by the LORD וְהַנִּשְׁבָּעִ֖ים <WH7650> and that swear בְּמַלְכָּֽם׃ <WH4445> Milcom

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּסוֹגִ֖ים <WH5472> And them that are turned back מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> from יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not בִקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> and [those] that have not sought אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or דְרָשֻֽׁהוּ׃ <WH1875> nor enquired

הַ֕ס <WH2013> Hold thy peace מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> at the presence אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD כִּ֤י <WH3588> for קָרוֹב֙ <WH7138> [is] at hand י֣וֹם <WH3117> for the day יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֵכִ֧ין <WH3559> hath prepared יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> for the LORD זֶ֖בַח <WH2077> a sacrifice הִקְדִּ֥ישׁ <WH6942> he hath bid קְרֻאָֽיו׃ <WH7121> his guests

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> will come בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in the day זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> sacrifice יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S וּפָקַדְתִּ֥י <WH6485> that I will punish עַל־ <WH5921> and הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> the princes וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> children הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king's וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַלֹּבְשִׁ֖ים <WH3847> and all such as are clothed מַלְבּ֥וּשׁ <WH4403> apparel נָכְרִֽי׃ <WH5237> with strange

וּפָקַדְתִּ֗י <WH6485> also will I punish עַ֧ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדּוֹלֵ֛ג <WH1801> all those that leap עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּפְתָּ֖ן <WH4670> on the threshold בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In the same day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> Who הַֽמְמַלְאִ֛ים <WH4390> which fill בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> houses אֲדֹנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH113> their masters' חָמָ֥ס <WH2555> with violence וּמִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> and deceit ס

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> become בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD ק֤וֹל <WH6963> [that there shall be] the noise צְעָקָה֙ <WH6818> of a cry מִשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַדָּגִ֔ים <WH1709> from the fish וִֽילָלָ֖ה <WH3215> and an howling מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּשְׁנֶ֑ה <WH4932> from the second וְשֶׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> crashing גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> and a great מֵהַגְּבָעֽוֹת׃ <WH1389> from the hills

הֵילִ֖ילוּ <WH3213> Howl יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> ye inhabitants הַמַּכְתֵּ֑שׁ <WH4389> of Maktesh כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִדְמָה֙ <WH1820> are cut down כָּל־ <WH3605> for all עַ֣ם <WH5971> people כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> for all the merchant נִכְרְת֖וּ <WH3772> are cut off כָּל־ <WH3605> All נְטִ֥ילֵי <WH5187> all they that bear כָֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> silver

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> will come בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> And it shall come to pass at that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> I אֲחַפֵּ֥שׂ <WH2664> [that] I will search אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> Jerusalem בַּנֵּר֑וֹת <WH5216> with candles וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <WH6485> and punish עַל־ <WH5921> and הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> the men הַקֹּֽפְאִים֙ <WH7087> that are settled עַל־ <WH5921> in שִׁמְרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8105> on their lees הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> that say בִּלְבָבָ֔ם <WH3824> in their heart לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יֵיטִ֥יב <WH3190> will not do good יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> do יָרֵֽעַ׃ <WH7489> neither will he do evil

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> will become חֵילָם֙ <WH2428> Therefore their goods לִמְשִׁסָּ֔ה <WH4933> shall become a booty וּבָתֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH1004> and their houses לִשְׁמָמָ֑ה <WH8077> a desolation וּבָנ֤וּ <WH1129> they shall also build בָתִּים֙ <WH1004> houses וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֵשֵׁ֔בוּ <WH3427> but not inhabit וְנָטְע֣וּ <WH5193> [them] and they shall plant כְרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> vineyards וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִשְׁתּ֖וּ <WH8354> but not drink אֶת־ <WH853> יֵינָֽם׃ <WH3196> the wine

קָר֤וֹב <WH7138> [is] near יוֹם־ <WH3117> day יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> The great קָר֖וֹב <WH7138> [it is] near וּמַהֵ֣ר <WH4118> and hasteth מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> greatly ק֚וֹל <WH6963> [even] the voice י֣וֹם <WH3117> of the day יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מַ֥ר <WH4751> there bitterly צֹרֵ֖חַ <WH6873> shall cry שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> it גִּבּֽוֹר׃ <WH1368> the mighty man

י֥וֹם <WH3117> That day עֶבְרָ֖ה <WH5678> of wrath הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> [is] a day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he י֧וֹם <WH3117> a day צָרָ֣ה <WH6869> of trouble וּמְצוּקָ֗ה <WH4691> and distress י֤וֹם <WH3117> a day שֹׁאָה֙ <WH7722> of wasteness וּמְשׁוֹאָ֔ה <WH4875> and desolation י֥וֹם <WH3117> a day חֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <WH2822> of darkness וַאֲפֵלָ֔ה <WH653> and gloominess י֥וֹם <WH3117> a day עָנָ֖ן <WH6051> of clouds וַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <WH6205> and thick darkness

י֥וֹם <WH3117> A day שׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> of the trumpet וּתְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> and alarm עַ֚ל <WH5921> Against הֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> cities הַבְּצֻר֔וֹת <WH1219> against the fenced וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> Against הַפִּנּ֥וֹת <WH6438> towers הַגְּבֹהֽוֹת׃ <WH1364> and against the high

וַהֲצֵרֹ֣תִי <WH6887> And I will bring distress לָאָדָ֗ם <WH120> upon men וְהָֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> that they shall walk כַּֽעִוְרִ֔ים <WH5787> like blind men כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> against the LORD חָטָ֑אוּ <WH2398> because they have sinned וְשֻׁפַּ֤ךְ <WH8210> shall be poured out דָּמָם֙ <WH1818> and their blood כֶּֽעָפָ֔ר <WH6083> as dust וּלְחֻמָ֖ם <WH3894> and their flesh כַּגְּלָלִֽים׃ <WH1561> as the dung

גַּם־ <WH1571> nor כַּסְפָּ֨ם <WH3701> Neither their silver גַּם־ <WH1571> nor זְהָבָ֜ם <WH2091> nor their gold לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> shall be able לְהַצִּילָ֗ם <WH5337> to deliver בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> them in the day עֶבְרַ֣ת <WH5678> wrath יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S וּבְאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> by the fire קִנְאָת֔וֹ <WH7068> of his jealousy תֵּאָכֵ֖ל <WH398> shall be devoured כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> but the whole land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָלָ֤ה <WH3617> riddance אַךְ־ <WH389> Indeed נִבְהָלָה֙ <WH926> even a speedy יַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> for he shall make אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> of all יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> of all them that dwell הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land ס
